name: A Dinghy's Journey
description:
A dinghy is a small boat usually towed or carried by a larger vessel. As a stray dinghy, wander around a vast, blue space. Talk to your new neighbors and figure out where you belong. This adventure is inspired by specific childhood memories, my own sailing experience, and the need to create a new home for myself.

Controls:

  • Mouse to move camera. WASD / arrow keys to sail. ESC key to exit the game. Press any key to advance dialog and interact with NPCs by running into them.
  • Navigational tip: sailing is a little awkward, as in Bitsy you move in just four directions. Keeping your mouse still might make it easier to mentally map which direction you are headed.

Special thanks to the 3D and audio Bitsy hacks.
